text:
Article 3(7) of Council Directive 2011/70/Euratom as follows: “radioactive waste” means
radioactive material in gaseous, liquid or solid form for which no further use is foreseen or
considered by the Member State or by a legal or natural person whose decision is accepted by the
Member State, and which is regulated as radioactive waste by a competent regulatory authority
under the legislative and regulatory framework of the Member State’.
